p: John H Stiel makes oath that the foregoing petition concerning the illegal detention of James Allison Parker - a free man of color, is trus as he hereof believes

Said Stiel has shown the James Parker for the last five or six years in the State of Illinois & knows the mother of said Parker to be a free woman and said James Allision Parker to be not a slave but a free man
Duly sworn before me on this 29th day of Septr 1858
